text: [Yego otveli v temnitsu, i on skazal tam]"O Yusuf, pravdivyy muzh! Razgaday nam [znacheniye sna] o semi tuchnykh korovakh, kotorykh pozhirayut sem' toshchikh, a takzhe o semi zelenykh kolos'yakh i drugikh - vysokhshikh, chtoby ya vernulsya [s razgadkoy] k lyudyam [pravitelya]. Byt' mozhet, oni uznayut [istinnuyu tsenu tebe]
